name: Fairly Toothless
description:
Oh no, little Martha accidentally killed the toothfairy! Now it's up to you to collect teeth from sleeping children and avoid detection at all costs. Santa and the Easter Bunny are counting on you!

Credits:

David Messner - Player Mechanics

David Märzendorfer -  elite and lead Programmer, Dialogs, 2D Animation

Sina Anders - Modelling, Texturing and Map Design

Mirjam Kuchling - Concept Art, Player Design, Musik
